name: 20 Second Stand
description:
20 Second Stand

You have 20 seconds to survive and the ground beneath your feet makes sure you know it.

This quick platform survival game was made in 12 hours for the #20SecondGameJam where you submit a game that lasts exactly 20 seconds. A 20 second game was so small that I figured there was no reason not to make one. Shame I only found out about the jam very late, so I settled on the quickest game idea I had. Have fun!

Features
  • The floor is the timer
     Some numbers are easier to walk on than others - you may actually need to pay attention.
  • No hassle
    Play the entire game in-browser. No reason not to try it out ;)
  • Teeny 
    The game is literally 20 seconds long. Seriously.
  • Easy
    A slight challenge at best - this game was meant to be a quick win, not a rage-inducer.
Credits

This game was thrown together by Asith (@AsithDevs on Twitter). Stick around for more random stuff. I have no idea what I could make next!
